title: 9.3 BB
overview: After the death of her boyfriend Bruno, a young police officer infiltrated in a far-right group, Le√Øla sees her world and her plans collapse. One evening, however, by a strange chance she finds herself at the theater in front of a rehearsal of Antigone by Bertolt Brecht. Upset, the young girl from 9.3, already passionate about poetry, leaves law school and takes her group of friends with her on a real theatrical adventure.
